channel.title: Another Help Topic. =P
channel.description:
KK, i'm just wondering i downloaded SCAR and it works fine. I downloaded the SRL but what do i do with it?
Also, can someone tell me the procedures of how to get a SCAR script in the box, and working perfectly?
Thanks.

item.title: Another Help Topic. =P
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

You call yourself “RunescapeHacker”. Yet you dont know shi* about hacking. Funny.

Btw to your information SCAR is not a hacking program.
To your question, if you do a quick search here there is tons of info that can help you out. Its realy ok to ask questions, but you should realy try a little bit first, its not that hard

Keep it up privat.

Read full topic
